comments:

workspace which I cannot delete.

The undeletable closed project disappeared when I restarted eclipse.

I am going to move this bug to PDE, since their builder is the one throwing all
the NPEs.  I have entered bug 90067 for the disappearing project.

we now guard againt the potential NPE that can be returned by IResource.getPath
()
